why-me.description: What drives me is turning concepts into something functional. I enjoy structuring logic, understanding processes, and implementing them in a way that users can actually work with. For me, it’s not enough for an application to simply exist, it needs to be practical and truly usable. Through my career change, I entered development with genuine ambition, eager to learn, focused, and determined to continuously improve. I work calmly, thoughtfully, and with a solution-oriented mindset. No unnecessary extras, just clear functionality.

my-skills.challenge-me: I am constantly learning new technologies and keeping up with the latest trends in web development.
my-skills.hidden-text: I'm happy to expand my knowledge towards backend development.

join.description: JOIN is a web-based organization tool inspired by the Kanban system. It allows you to create tasks, share them with colleagues or friends, and manage them collaboratively. The app also includes a contact overview with clearly structured information. On the summary page, you're greeted personally and get a compact view of your upcoming tasks.

el-pollo-loco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

feedback.anne-dalchow: Working with Tony on the JOIN project was enriching for me in every respect. Both professionally and personally, our collaboration was excellent. Tony impresses with his pronounced team spirit, calm, focused way of working and clear, structured thinking. I particularly appreciated the professional exchange with him. You can discuss technical challenges very well with him and work out well-thought-out solutions together. I always felt comfortable and motivated when working with Tony and would be very happy to work with him again.
